attributes.action: To Not charge under 18s on TFL on Busses
attributes.additional_details:
TFL free travel for under 18s is essential for many communities in all socioeconomic backgrounds and can act as a lifeline for so many young new families. It can be used for all sorts showing a family having freedom of movement for its kids. The government can help out TFL being own by the government.
Free travel can be so crucial for kids in london that scrapping the idea could ultimately damage so many kids and families ability to grow during these tough times.
attributes.background: We would like the government to make sure TFL keeps its current rule of free bus transport in london for under 18 as the government owns TFL acting as a private company

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331453
